# Imar Group Admin Panel - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
An admin panel for Imar Group's investment management system built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include dashboard statistics, investment tracking, client management, and portfolio visualization.

## Project Structure
```
Imar Group Admin Panel/
├── index.html              # Main dashboard page
├── css/
│   └── styles.css         # All styling and responsive design
├── js/
│   └── script.js          # All JavaScript functionality
└── assets/                # Placeholder for images and icons
```

## Key Features Implemented
- Responsive dashboard with sidebar navigation
- Statistics cards showing key metrics
- Data tables for investment tracking
- Chart.js integration for visualizations (line and doughnut charts)
- Search and filtering functionality
- Modal forms for editing investments
- Dark/light theme support via CSS variables
- Mobile-responsive design

## Technologies Used
- HTML5
- CSS3 (with CSS variables for theming)
- Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+)
- Chart.js library for data visualization
- Font Awesome icons

## Running the Project
1. Open `index.html` in a modern web browser
2. No build process or dependencies required
3. All files are self-contained and ready to use

## Customization Notes
- Update color scheme in CSS variables (`:root` in styles.css)
- Replace placeholder avatar image in `assets/` folder
- API endpoints can be integrated in script.js functions
- All chart data can be connected to real data sources
